meta.title: AVA Arts District - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: AVA Arts District - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA

div.span: AVA is a brand-new living space in Downtown Los Angeles’ most exciting and vibrant neighborhood, the Arts District. The reasons to love Arts District are endless. Which is why we chose to be in the heart of it all. AVA Arts District will feature studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom apartments for lease with dens in select homes. Our open concept floor plans feature kitchens with stainless steel appliances, quartz-stone countertops, and tile backsplash. We offer unique home features including sliding barn doors, open-concept customizable closets and gear walls for storing all your things, your way. Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, smart access entry, smart thermostats, and digital resident services including online rent payment and service requests, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Our pet-friendly community features a fully-loaded fitness center, courtyard pool, multiple lounge areas, co-working spaces, and rooftop terrace. Best of all, we’re located in Arts District with tons of entertaining and dining options, making our home base your perfect home base.

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.span: Best of all, we’re located in Arts District with tons of entertaining and dining options, making our home base your perfect home base.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Income restricted for rent available through the income restricted housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes are designed with sustainability in mind, so you can live in an environment that’s lighter on the planet and its resources.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Join our VIP list and be the first to learn about floorplans, pricing, availability and community tours.
div.div: 1540 E. Industrial Street • Los Angeles, CA 90021

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
